buildResult.output: All checks pass after fixing 26 lint errors: pnpm tsc --noEmit (0 errors), cargo clippy (0 warnings), pnpm eslint src/ (0 errors). Fixes: replaced deprecated ElementRef with ComponentRef in shadcn/ui components, removed unnecessary async from getDb, fixed void expression arrow shorthands.

decisions: Used @tauri-apps/plugin-sql JS API for CRUD (Rust API is pub(crate))
crypto.randomUUID() for IDs instead of uuid dep
Optimistic local state updates in Zustand store
Commands dir module for future extensibility
implementResult.summary: Implemented Phase 2: Core Layout + Projects. Three-pane resizable layout (left 20%, middle 50%, right 30%), project sidebar with full CRUD, folder picker via Tauri dialog, SQLite persistence via @tauri-apps/plugin-sql JS API, Zustand store with selectors, dark theme styling. 8 shadcn/ui components installed. All TypeScript and Rust compiles clean.

phase.description: Three-pane layout with shadcn/ui ResizablePanelGroup (left: projects, middle: chat placeholder, right: files placeholder). Left pane: project list with "Add Project" button. Folder picker via Tauri dialog API. Project CRUD (add, rename, soft-delete) with SQLite persistence. Empty state CTA "Add your first project". Zustand project store with selective subscriptions. Design language: Linear/Raycast inspired, dark theme with HSL vars from PLAN.md (bg hsl(224,71%,4%), surface hsl(224,71%,6%), etc). Inter font for UI (13px), JetBrains Mono for code. 4px spacing base, 1px borders, no shadows.
phase.name: Core Layout + Projects
phase.screenshotDescription: Three-pane layout with dark theme, left pane showing empty project list with Add Project button and CTA
tasks: Left pane: project list with Add Project button
Folder picker via Tauri dialog API

screenshotResult.description: Three-pane dark layout. Left: PROJECTS header with + button, empty state 'No projects yet' with Add Project CTA. Center: 'Select a project to get started' empty state. Right: 'No project selected' empty state. All panes separated with subtle borders. Dark navy/blue-black theme throughout.
